name: Hanoi city tour with cooking class
description: Hanoi city tour with cooking class from Aroka Travel is always the premier choice for every single traveler visiting the one-thousand-year-old capital city. Hanoi is the combination between the ancient beauty and modern features of developing oriental urban. The second biggest city in Vietnam- Hanoi has more attractions to see and to feel than tourists think. One day city tour brings you to see Ho Chi Minh complex, Museum of  Ethnology, Temple of Literature and Hoa Lo prison which are the best must-sees. Especially, the cooking class with local chef is really impressive and makes your tour unforgettable. Visitors have time to observe the key destinations in Hanoi as long as enjoy the Vietnamese typical cuisine for lunch and for cooking class.
